user.name: Adam Rounsville
user.bio: Full Stack Software Engineer | Machine Learning Researcher @ PCCL | CS @ BYU

node.name: excalibur-chess-engine
node.description: A chess engine that implements a minimax algorithm, alpha-beta pruning, piece-square tables, move ordering, and a command-line UI

node.name: gpt3-sentence-transformer-pipeline
node.description: A Python pipeline to generate responses using GPT3, map them to a vector space using the T5 XXL sentence transformer, use PCA and UMAP dimensionality-reduction methods, and then provide visualizations using Plotly and sentiment analysis using TextBlob

node.name: simple-chatgpt
node.description: A wrapper around OpenAI's ChatGPT API that makes it easy to create custom messages and conversations

node.name: ai-chatbot-website
node.description: An AI chatbot website built using Next.js and TypeScript, and powered by OpenAI's gpt-3.5-turbo API

node.name: fantasy-basketball
node.description: A fantasy basketball trading card website built using Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

node.name: 3D-maze-pathfinder
node.description: A C++ command-line program that utilizes a custom path-finding algorithm built using recursion, vectors, and sets to find the valid path to traverse a 3D maze
